description:
After a Golden Dragon attack pushes them into the sea, Lina and the crew inadvertently destroy the harbor. With no way to return to land, the gang begins a journey!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ifuu Doudou? Tabidachi no Ho o Agero!
Majestic? Hoist Sails for the Journey!
Majestueux ? Levons les voiles du voyage !
威風堂々? 旅立ちの帆をあげろ!
